alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 9:04AM EDT until March 20 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Bamberg and Southeastern Orangeburg Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EDT Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
